channel.title: help making wasteland gear
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "help making wasteland gear"

item.title: Re: help making wasteland gear
item.content:encoded: thanks, i guess i owe you 2 now XP

item.title: Re: help making wasteland gear
item.content:encoded:
Here is a full list of how to make things:

Distill:

Broken Machinery -> Cracked Gear x2
Broken Spyglass -> Reflector Shard x1
Copper Dust -> Copper Slag x1
Copper Shaft -> Copper Sliver x1
Copper Sliver -> Copper Dust x1
Cracked Glasses -> Brass Wiring x1
Cracked Vial -> Acid Vial x3
Burnt Scroll -> Blackened Dust x2
Crumbling Minerals -> Wasteland Dust x3
Tangled Metal -> Metal Scraps x3
Threadbare Robe -> Filter Thread x2

Appraise:

Ash-Covered Coin -> Copper Coin (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Coin -> Silver Coin (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Coin -> Gold Coin (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Coin -> Crystal Lens (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Coin -> Copper Coin (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Coin -> Silver Coin (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Coin -> Gold Coin (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Coin -> Crystal Lens (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Small Pearl (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Small Emerald (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Small Ruby (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Small Diamond (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Shamrock (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Gem -> Sharpening Stone (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Ring -> Copper Ring (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Ring -> Gold Ring (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Ring -> Platinum Ring (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Ring -> Cobalt Ring (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Ring -> Copper Ring (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Ring -> Gold Ring (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Ring -> Platinum Ring (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Ring -> Cobalt Ring (Super-Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Shaft -> Copper Shaft (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Shaft -> Silver Shaft (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Shaft -> Cobalt Shaft (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Shaft -> Copper Shaft (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Shaft -> Silver Shaft (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Rare Shaft -> Cobalt Shaft (Rare ?)
Ash-Covered Tile -> Wooden Tile (Common ?)
Ash-Covered Tile -> Ceramic Tile (Uncommon ?)
Ash-Covered Tile -> Steel Tile (Rare ?)
Sticky Thread -> Filter Thread (Common ?)
Sticky Thread -> Indestructible Thread (Super-Rare ?)

Combine / Mix:

Acid Vial + Copper Slag = Copper Dust
Acid Vial + Crystal Lens = Crystal Slag
Average Gear + Blackened Dust = Perfect Gear
Average Gear + Cobalt Pole = Quality Polearm
Average Gear + Silver Pole = Quality Polearm
Average Handle + Basic Firing Pin = Average Pistol
Basic Firing Pin + Average Handle = Average Pistol
Basic Firing Pin + Basic Handle = Makeshift Pistol
Basic Handle + Basic Firing Pin = Makeshift Pistol
Basic Harness + Filter Wrappings = Basic Dustcloak
Basic Polearm + Curved Blade = Makeshift Scythe
Blackened Dust + Average Gear = Perfect Gear
Blackened Dust + Cobalt Shaft = Cobalt Firing Pin
Blackened Dust + Copper Shaft = Basic Firing Pin
Blackened Dust + Cracked Gear = Average Gear
Blackened Dust + Potion Base = Jet-Black Potion
Brass Framework + Crystal Lens = Desert Monocle
Brass Wiring + Brass Wiring = Brass Framework
Ceramic Tile + Ceramic Tile = Ceramic Plating
Ceramic Tile + Steel Tile = Reinforced Plating
Cobalt Firing Pin + Reinforced Handle = Wasteland Pistol *
Cobalt Pole + Perfect Gear = Excellent Polearm
Cobalt Shaft + Cobalt Shaft = Cobalt Pole
Cobalt Shaft + Blackened Dust = Cobalt Firing Pin
Copper Pole + Cracked Gear = Makeshift Polearm
Copper Shaft + Blackened Dust = Basic Firing Pin
Copper Shaft + Copper Shaft = Copper Pole
Copper Shaft + Metal Rivets = Basic Handle
Copper Slag + Acid Vial = Copper Dust
Cracked Gear + Blackened Dust = Average Gear
Cracked Gear + Copper Pole = Makeshift Polearm
Crystal Lens + Brass Framework = Desert Monocle
Crystal Lens + Acid Vial = Crystal Slag
Crystal Slag + Sharpening Stone = Sharp Crystal
Curved Blade + Basic Polearm = Makeshift Scythe
Curved Blade + Quality Polearm = Silver Scythe
Desert Monocle + Desert Monocle = Desert Shades *
Dustpile + Dustpile = Dust Matrix
Dust Matrix + Filter Wrappings = Wasteland Rebreather
Excellent Polearm + Sharp Crystal = Wasteland Scythe *
Filter Thread + Filter Thread = Filter Wrappings
Filter Wrappings + Basic Harness = Basic Dustcloak
Filter Wrappings + Dust Matrix = Wasteland Rebreather
Filter Wrappings + Wasteland Harness = Wasteland Dustcloak *
Filter Wrappings + Weighted Harness = Weighted Dustcloak
Indestructible Thread + Indestructible Thread = BOOM!
Metal Rivets + Copper Shaft = Basic Handle
Metal Rivets + Reinforced Plating = Wasteland Harness
Metal Rivets + Silver Shaft = Reinforced Handle
Metal Rivets + Steel Plating = Weighted Harness
Metal Rivets + Wooden Plating = Basic Harness
Metal Scraps + Metal Scraps = Metal Rivets
Perfect Gear + Cobalt Pole = Excellent Polearm
Potion Base + Blackened Dust = Jet-Black Potion
Potion Base + Wasteland Dust = Ochre Potion *
Quality Polearm + Curved Blade = Silver Scythe
Reflector Shard + Sharpening Stone = Curved Blade
Reinforced Handle + Cobalt Firing Pin = Wasteland Pistol *
Reinforced Plating + Metal Rivets = Wasteland Harness
Sharp Crystal + Excellent Polearm = Wasteland Scythe *
Sharpening Stone + Crystal Slag = Sharp Crystal
Sharpening Stone + Reflector Shard = Curved Blade
Silver Pole + Average Gear = Quality Polearm
Silver Shaft + Metal Rivets = Reinforced Handle
Silver Shaft + Silver Shaft = Silver Pole
Steel Plating + Metal Rivets = Weighted Harness
Steel Tile + Ceramic Tile = Reinforced Plating
Steel Tile + Steel Tile = Steel Plating
Wasteland Dust + Potion Base = Ochre Potion *
Wasteland Dust + Wasteland Dust = Dustpile
Wasteland Harness + Filter Wrappings = Wasteland Dustcloak ***
Weighted Harness + Filter Wrappings = Weighted Dustcloak
Wooden Plating + Metal Rivets = Basic Harness
Wooden Tile + Wooden Tile = Wooden Plating

item.title: help making wasteland gear
item.content:encoded: with the items listed ahead is there any wasteland items i can make that i could use for somthing? 13 Filtered Thread 3 Wasteland Dust 1 Silver Shaft 9 Copper Shaft 6 Wooden Tile 18 Acid Vial 26 Blackened Dust 2 Reflector Shard 1 Nightshade 1 Wasteland Harness 1 Metal Rivets 8 Dust Matrix 2 Ceramic Tile 1 Reinforced Handle 6 Metal Scraps
